name: UpAge
description:
This is our entry to the weeklygamejam 61 with the theme 'upgrade a game'.

You play a timetraveller that fights through several timespaces against a variety of enemies. When you're lucky, you can upgrade to a new weapon - making you even stronger!

When you advanced enough in a timeperiod, you can travel to the next dimension BUT there is an extra: You can upgrade several variables in the game, deciding how the gameplay goes for yourself. For examle you can make enemies spawn faster - Making your game harder, but having a faster progress in the game!
